body_html: For uncompressed files, you can concatenate them since there is no per-file header. Beyond that, I don't think we have immediate plans to implement append. That comment you link to was written before we supported compression, which complicates the implementation of the feature.
body_text: For uncompressed files, you can concatenate them since there is no per-file header. Beyond that, I don't think we have immediate plans to implement append.  That comment you link to was written before we supported compression, which complicates the implementation of the feature.
body: For uncompressed files, you can concatenate them since there is no per-file header. Beyond that, I don't think we have immediate plans to implement append.  That comment you link to was written before we supported compression, which complicates the implementation of the feature.
